import React from "react"; import Section from "./Section"; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import Avatar3 from "./Avatar3"; import { useRouter } from "./../util/router.js"; function CreateProfileSection(props) { const router = useRouter(); const [formAlert, setFormAlert] = useState(null); const handleAuth = (user) => { router.push(props.afterAuthPath); }; const handleFormAlert = (data) => { setFormAlert(data); }; const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); }; return (
Image Upload Full Name School Name Year Create a Password LinkedIn (optional) Website (optional)
); } export default CreateProfileSection;
